author: Tara Law
title: The Tornadoes That Rocked the South Show How Much More Dangerous Natural Disasters Will Be in the Coronavirus Era
description: An unusually violent outbreak of tornadoes in the American South offers a grim preview of natural disaster response in the coronavirus era.
content: Anna Jones, a 25-year-old in Chattanooga, Tennessee, was trying to be as safe as possible during the COVID-19 outbreak. She was staying at home, taking her nursing classes online, and she even quit her job to avoid spreading the virus to her family. Then, on … [+6820 chars]
